ResearchProjectDef.label: basic xenobotany
ResearchProjectDef.description: The study of alien plants, and by extension of terran plants in alien environments.\n\nThis research unlocks basic Botany growing zones, the Nutrient plant and the Botany Workbench.

ResearchProjectDef.label: nutrient pipes
ResearchProjectDef.description: This research unlocks the building of nutrient pipe networks, including nutrient broth generators, nutrient reservoirs, and the pipes themselves. Nutrient broth is a resource that will be in constant need by most of the machines needed to conduct botanical experiments.
